name: Nip Nop
description:
WELCOME TO NIP NOP, A GODOT REMAKE OF THE CLASSIC PONG GAME WHERE YOU CONTROL THE BALL

THE GAME

You are the ball. Your goal is to make the best score possible by tapping on the moving paddles

YOUR OWN WAY TO PLAY

use the mouse

or

use the arrows

THIS IS JUST A PROTOTYPE

There's still bugs and stuff that will not be in the game in the final version, we will continue to develop the game if the idea is appreciated, let us know !
